DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess patient compliance DuoTrav versus concomitant administration Timolol 0.5 % plus TRAVATAN patient open-angle glaucoma ocular hypertension .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase IIIb Study DuoTrav Treat Glaucoma Ocular Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Adult patient openangle glaucoma ocular hypertension ; Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Visual acuity bad 0.60 ; Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
